attributes.action: Consider Deportation for all non UK passport holders convicted of a criminal offence under the cover of rioting in the UK
attributes.additional_details: This is to gain support for the deportation of all non UK passport holders who are convicted of a criminal offence whilst using the current riot situation as a cover to include public disorder, assault of any nature, robbery, burglary, arson, looting or theft of any nature, conspiracy to organise or incite violence, corruption of minors into criminal activity below the age of criminality, use of the internet or communications networks to organise public disorder.
